root.name: Taekwondo
root.description: Taekwon-Do is based on real Taekwondo, using real attacks and tournament rules. All in all there are 19 different characters who all have their own special moves, and players can also make their own customized fighters with unique abilities, etc. The fighting control is very simple with the standardized attack buttons and direction button attack button combinations. There are four different game modes: Tournament, Versus, Tag Battle by Turns and Practice. The player can choose from two languages: Japanese and Korean.Taekwon-Do was only released in Japan and South Korea in 1994.
